name: Nuclear 2050
description: One 3 atoms generators had a serious mistake, besides, panic broke out in the whole town. A gas was released and infected some people and, besides, also the scientists in the nuclear power station. Besides, you are alone and must stop the disaster!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/10 64bit Processor: CPU : Intel Core i5 3,0 Ghz or Amd Fx 4300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or Nvidia Geforce GT 730 Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/10 64bit Processor: CPU : Intel Core i5/i7 4.0 GHz or Amd Ryzen 5 1400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti / GTX 1060 Storage: 20 GB available space
